Home » 40P22 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
11 Kusalattika, Arūpāvacaraduka
Kusalattika, Arūpāvacaraduka
31.
71Nakusalaṃ naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
72Nakusalaṃ nanaarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca.
